segments.text: I see the woman working so diligently at the sink, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost funny how she's focused so intently on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the water is creating quite the mess beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's stepping into a puddle without a care in the world!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching into the cookie jar, and I can hardly believe he's brave enough to do that on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easily he could fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her lack of awareness is both amusing and alarming at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
